page.title: 17DAILY LIFE OF A HOUSEWIFE
page.content: By a member of Market Weston & District WI: My husband went to work at 7.00am. Our children are on school holiday so I left them with my mother before going to work at 8.30.Home at ll.45, did house work & washing before a snack lunch.At 1.00 an elderly friend telephoned to ask me to clean up for her after the chimney sweep.Taking the children in the car, I arrived at 2.00pm.After a chat,I did the cleaning while the children fished in a nearby river.They arrived back at 4.30pm with feet & trousers very wet.Home again at 5.l5pm,the children got clean clothes and I did more house work and prepared dinner.My husband arrived home at about 7.00pm.The children have a bath at 9.00pm & go to bed. I have a bath then sit down,with a cup of coffee to watch television then went to bed at about 11.00pm.
